title: Gojo Ethiopian Cuisine
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Ethiopian food restaurant. Inexpensive lunch is buffet style, costs around $7.49, and is mostly vegan. There are two dishes which have meat, and the owner will point out which two they are. Everything else is vegan on the buffet, no eggs or dairy. Gojo Ethiopian cuisine has expanded it's vegan choices by adding vegan Ethiopian salads. Dinner is a la carte. Gojo is located just south of Wolfgang's.
